<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Construct Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3055) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 26</row>

**Prerequisites**
[construct companion](/companions/construct-companions)

</column>

---

You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability. It becomes an [advanced construct companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=1612). During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command a Minion action, your construct companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.

<title level="2">Advanced Construct Companion leads to...</title>
[Incredible Construct Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3065)
name: Advanced Construct Companion
